data.eml:eml: Three new species of Halozercon (Acari: Mesostigmata: Zerconidae) from Altai Mountains in South Siberia (Russia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marchenko, Irina I. (2019): Three new species of Halozercon (Acari: Mesostigmata: Zerconidae) from Altai Mountains in South Siberia (Russia). Zootaxa 4568 (3): 401-434, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.3.1
